CompanyPage.title: About Zatas
CompanyPage.description: We transform ideas into digital products that impact millions of people around the world
history: Zatas' journey began when a personal trainer, recommended by other programmers, contacted one of the partners, Bruno, looking for a way to optimize his student management. With this proposal in hand, Bruno invited Gabriel and Antony to collaborate on the application's development.

The project was a success and showed the team the power of collaboration. To complement the group's technical skills, Bryan was invited to the partnership, bringing his expertise in marketing and design.

Zatas was founded on this foundation: the union of diverse skills with the purpose of offering complete solutions. The company started by solving a specific problem and today continues with the same passion for turning each client's challenges into successful projects.

The name 'Zatas' was chosen for its strong and memorable sound. It refers to the word 'exact', reflecting the essence of the company's work: the search for precision, logic, and data intelligence in the construction of each solution. Zatas is synonymous with the exact solution for each client's challenge.
CompanyPage.cardMissionText: To create innovative digital solutions that transform businesses and improve people's lives through technology.
CompanyPage.cardVisionText: To be a global leader in digital product development, recognized for excellence and positive impact.
CompanyPage.cardValuesText: Continuous innovation, technical excellence, teamwork, transparency, and customer focus.

TeamPage.title: Our Team
TeamPage.description: Meet the founders who make it all possible

joao-silva.name: João Silva
joao-silva.bio: Serial entrepreneur with over 15 years of experience in technology. Passionate about creating solutions that impact millions of people.

experience.description: Leading the strategic vision and growth of the company, expanding to 5 countries.
Responsible for launching 3 products that generated R$50M in revenue.

maria-santos.name: Maria Santos
maria-santos.bio: Software engineer specializing in scalable system architecture. Technical leader focused on innovation and quality.

experience.description: Leading a team of 50+ engineers, building infrastructure serving 1M+ users.
Consulting for Fortune 500 companies on cloud migration.

pedro-oliveira.name: Pedro Oliveira
pedro-oliveira.bio: Product designer focused on user experience. Believes design is about solving problems, not just aesthetics.

experience.description: Leading product and design vision, creating award-winning experiences.
Responsible for redesigning the app used by 40M+ customers.

ana-costa.name: Ana Costa
ana-costa.bio: Specialist in growth marketing and branding. Built marketing strategies that generated 300% growth in startups.

experience.description: Leading all marketing and brand growth initiatives.
Responsible for 10x growth in the customer base.

ContactPage.title: Contact
ContactPage.subtitle: Have an idea or project? We'd love to hear from you.

desenvolvimento.title: Desenvolvimento
desenvolvimento.description: Criamos soluções de software robustas, desde APIs escaláveis até aplicações web e móveis interativas.

design.title: Design
design.description: Desenhamos interfaces intuitivas e marcas memoráveis que conectam sua empresa ao seu público.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Estratégias digitais focadas em crescimento, engajamento e resultados mensuráveis.

zatas-website.title: Website Zatas
zatas-website.description: Desenvolvimento do website institucional da Zatas, focado em performance e animações.
zatas-website.fullDescription: Uma descrição muito mais longa e detalhada sobre o desafio, a solução e os resultados do projeto do website da Zatas. Explicando as escolhas tecnológicas e o impacto para o cliente.

personal-app.title: Aplicativo de Treino
personal-app.description: App mobile para personal trainers e alunos gerenciarem treinos e progresso.
personal-app.fullDescription: Este projeto envolveu a criação de um backend robusto com Spring Boot e um aplicativo móvel multiplataforma com React Native, focado em usabilidade e funcionalidade offline.

gerenciador-de-alunos.title: Student Manager
gerenciador-de-alunos.description: The System manages and centralizes classes from various schools
gerenciador-de-alunos.fullDescription: The system was developed with the purpose of managing the professor's different classes across various schools, addressing a failing of the government platform intended for teachers. The system, in turn, centralizes and organizes this information management.

trainingSec.title: E-commerce Platform
trainingSec.description: Platform developed to manage and centralize NOVAES’s safety training, integrating employees, job roles, and Regulatory Standards.
trainingSec.fullDescription: This safety training platform was developed with the goal of centralizing the logistics of NOVAES’s internal training, including employee management and the relationships between job positions and the Regulatory Standards required for each role.

EPI-stock.title: EPI - Stock
EPI-stock.description: Platform for managing PPE inventory, with item tracking and CSV report export.
EPI-stock.fullDescription: This platform is a PPE inventory manager designed to replace spreadsheet-based control. It allows users to record item check-ins and check-outs, as well as export reports in CSV format.

cash-flow.title: Cash Flow
cash-flow.description: Project by the MDS group (ADS Senai-601/2024) to centralize reimbursement and expense control for corporate travel.
cash-flow.fullDescription: This project was developed by the MDS group (Magic and Software Development) from the 2024 class of the Systems Analysis and Development (ADS) course at Senai-601. The goal of the project was to centralize the logistics of reimbursements and expense control for employees on corporate trips.

carlos-advogado.title: Carlos Lawyer - Social Media Design
carlos-advogado.fullDescription: This social media project was created for a lawyer specializing in the legal field, focusing on conveying authority, trust, and professionalism through design.

souzaevilela.title: Souza & Vilela Banking Law - Social Media Design
souzaevilela.fullDescription: This social media project was developed for a lawyer specialized in the banking sector, with the goal of strengthening their digital presence and conveying credibility, trust, and authority within the legal industry.

luiz-gustavo.title: Luiz Gustavo - Social Media Design
luiz-gustavo.fullDescription: This social media project was developed for a lawyer in the legal niche, aiming to express authority, credibility, and sophistication through design.

montela-brand.title: MONTELA - Brand Visual Identity
montela-brand.description: Visual Identity Project – MONTELA, Intelligence that works for you
montela-brand.fullDescription: This visual identity project was created for MONTELA, with the goal of conveying authority, credibility, and sophistication through design.

lyria.title: Lyria
lyria.description: LyrIA is an intelligent virtual assistant developed as the final project for the Systems Development Technician course.
lyria.fullDescription: LyrIA is an intelligent virtual assistant developed as the final project for the Systems Development Technician course. The application features a modern web interface and a robust back-end, using an LLM (Large Language Model) to generate dynamic and contextual responses. ✨ The goal is to provide a natural conversational experience, capable of answering general questions and retrieving up-to-date information from the web to ensure accuracy.

zatas.title: ZATAS - Brand Visual Identity
zatas.description: Visual Identity Project – ZATAS, your vision in technology and your technology in results
zatas.fullDescription: The visual identity of ZATAS was developed with a foundation of precision, strategy, and innovation. Inspired by Monte Carlo, the brand was created under the philosophy of working 'from Z to A' — starting from the final goal to build complete strategies from the very beginning. The chosen colors — black, gray, white, and shades of blue — represent trust, technology, and stability, expressing the balance between sophistication and efficiency. The Montserrat typeface, in Regular and Medium variations, reinforces clarity and geometric harmony, symbolizing the fusion between design and performance. The result is a modern, technology-driven brand with a strong visual presence that communicates solidity, innovation, and purpose in every detail.
